products.name: iPhone 14 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 14 Pro comes with a 6.1-inch ProMotion OLED display with 1-120Hz adaptive refresh rates, Dolby Vision, and a Face ID Dynamic Island that allows Apple to utilize an always-on display feature, which dims the lock screen similarly to an Apple Watch.

products.name: Pixel 7 Pro
products.description: The Google Pixel 7 Pro gets the premium treatment with a sharper curved edge display, more cameras and bigger battery. The Pixel 7 Pro looks premium compared to the matte-finished Pixel 7 even though the two smartphones share the same core hardware.

products.name: M1 Macbook Air
products.desc: Apple Macbook air with apple silicon
products.description: The M1 MacBook Air is a lightweight and powerful laptop from Apple that features the latest Apple-designed M1 chip, offering lightning-fast performance and longer battery life. With a stunning Retina display, Magic Keyboard, and Touch ID.

products.name: Playstation 5
products.description: The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is the latest gaming console from Sony, featuring advanced hardware and technology for immersive gaming experiences. It boasts lightning-fast load times, stunning graphics and visual effects, and a customized SSD for speedy game installations and streaming.

products.name: Airpods Pro
products.description: AirPods Pro are Apple's wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation technology. They feature a comfortable in-ear design with customizable silicone tips for a secure and comfortable fit.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.description: The iPad Pro is Apple's high-end tablet that offers powerful performance and advanced features. It comes in two sizes: 11 inches and 12.9 inches, and features a Liquid Retina display with ProMotion technology that offers smooth scrolling and high refresh rates.

products.name: Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is a high-end smartphone from Samsung, featuring a large 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a resolution of 3200x1440 pixels. It is powered by the Exynos 2100 or Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor (depending on region) and comes with 12GB or 16GB of RAM, depending on the configuration.

products.name: Galaxy S21
products.description: The Galaxy S21 is a high-end smartphone from Samsung, featuring a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels. It is powered by the Exynos 2100 or Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor (depending on region) and comes with 8GB of RAM.

products.name: Apple Watch
products.description: The Apple Watch is a smartwatch that offers advanced features such as health and fitness tracking, notifications, GPS, and cellular connectivity. It comes in a variety of styles and materials, and offers a wide range of apps and watch faces to customize your experience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch is a smartwatch that offers advanced features such as fitness tracking, smartphone notifications, and Samsung Pay.

products.name: Gaming Mouse
products.description: A gaming mouse is designed for gamers and offers features such as programmable buttons, adjustable DPI, and customizable RGB lighting.

products.name: S128 Folding Mini Drone
products.description: A mini drone is a small and portable remote-controlled drone that can fit in the palm of your hand. It offers features such as a built-in camera, altitude hold, and automatic obstacle avoidance

products.name: GoPro Pole Mount
products.description: A GoPro camera is a compact and rugged camera designed for capturing action-packed moments. It offers features such as high-quality video and photo capabilities, waterproof design, and advanced features like HyperSmooth stabilization and TimeWarp

products.name: Pocket Tripod
products.description: A tripod is a three-legged stand that provides stability for a camera or other device. It's designed to keep the device steady and prevent camera shake during photography or video recording, and allows for precise framing and composition.

products.name: Google Home Mini
products.description: Google Nest Mini is a voice-activated smart speaker powered by Google Assistant. It allows you to control your smart home devices, play music, ask questions, and get news and weather updates hands-free, simply by using your voice.

products.name: Virtual Reality Handset
products.desc: HTC VIVE Pro Virtual Reality Handset
products.description: A virtual reality headset is a device that allows you to immerse yourself in a simulated environment using VR technology.

products.name: HP Pavillion x360
products.description: A foldable HP laptop is a highly portable and versatile device that can be folded in multiple ways, allowing it to function as both a laptop and a tablet. It offers features such as touch screen display, stylus support, and powerful processors.

products.name: Apple iPad
products.description: The Apple iPad 5th Gen is a powerful tablet that offers a 9.7-inch Retina display, A9 chip, 8-megapixel camera, and support for Apple Pencil. It provides a fast and fluid user experience, making it perfect for work, education, and entertainment.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: The Razer Chroma Bluetooth Speaker is a compact and portable speaker that offers 16.8 million customizable colors and immersive 360-degree sound for an unparalleled audio experience.

products.name: boAt Airdopes 131 Pro
products.description: The boAt Airdopes 131 Pro is a pair of wireless earbuds that offer powerful 13mm drivers, IPX4 water resistance, and up to 15 hours of total playback time with the charging case. It also features touch controls for easy access to music, calls, and voice assistants.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
products.desc: Samsung smartwatch with Google Wear OS
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is a stylish and functional smartwatch that runs on Google Wear OS. It offers advanced health and fitness tracking, GPS.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.desc: Dell ultrabook with 11th gen Intel Core processors
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 is a sleek and powerful ultrabook that features 11th generation Intel Core processors, up to 16GB of RAM, and a stunning 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display with 4K resolution. It's perfect for work or play on the go.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 are wireless noise-cancelling headphones that offer advanced noise cancelling technology, up to 24 hours of battery life, and built-in voice assistants. They're perfect for work or travel, with a comfortable and durable design.

products.name: Sony A7 IV
products.description: The Sony A7 IV is a high-end mirrorless camera that features a 33MP full-frame sensor, advanced autofocus, and 4K video capabilities. It's perfect for professional photographers and videographers who demand the best performance and image quality.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
products.desc: Microsoft ultrabook with AMD Ryzen processors
products.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is a powerful and stylish ultrabook that features AMD Ryzen processors, up to 16GB of RAM.

products.name: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Ti
products.desc: Nvidia graphics card for high-end gaming
products.description: The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Ti is a high-end graphics card that offers advanced ray tracing and DLSS technology.

products.name: Fitbit Charge 5
products.desc: Fitness tracker with advanced health monitoring
products.description: The Fitbit Charge 5 is a high-end fitness tracker that offers advanced health monitoring features, including ECG and skin temperature sensors. It also features up to 7 days of battery life, GPS tracking, and personalized workout guidance.

products.name: Amazon Echo Show 15
products.description: The Amazon Echo Show 15 is a large smart display with a 15-inch touchscreen and built-in Alexa voice assistant. It offers video calling, streaming, and smart home control, making it the perfect addition to any home or office.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 is a high-end tablet that features an 11-inch Super AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and up to 1TB of storage.

products.name: Breville Barista Pro
products.description: The Breville Barista Pro is a high-end espresso machine that features a built-in grinder, advanced temperature control, and automatic milk frothing. It's perfect for coffee enthusiasts who demand the best taste and quality in every cup.

products.name: Garmin Forerunner 955
products.description: The Garmin Forerunner 955 is a high-end GPS running watch that offers advanced workout features, including VO2 max, training load, and recovery time.

products.name: Apple TV 4K (2021)
products.description: The Apple TV 4K (2021) is a high-end streaming device that offers 4K HDR and Dolby Vision video, as well as access to Apple TV+, Netflix, and other popular streaming services. It also features Siri voice control and HomeKit compatibility.

products.name: Logitech MX Master 3
products.description: The Logitech MX Master 3 is a high-end wireless mouse that features an advanced ergonomic design, advanced tracking technology, and customizable buttons.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 are high-end wireless noise-canceling headphones with industry-leading noise-canceling technology. They offer up to 30 hours of battery life, touch controls, and support for high-quality audio codecs like LDAC.

products.name: DJI Mavic 3
products.description: The DJI Mavic 3 is a professional-grade drone with an 8K camera, 3-axis gimbal, and up to 46 minutes of flight time. It features obstacle avoidance sensors, intelligent flight modes, and 4-directional obstacle sensing.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
products.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is an ultra-thin laptop with a touchscreen display, up to 19 hours of battery life, and powerful Intel or AMD processors.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
products.description: It features a powerful Exynos processor, up to 12GB of RAM, and up to 1TB of storage.

products.name: Canon EOS R3
products.description: The Canon EOS R3 is a professional-grade mirrorless camera with a 24.1MP sensor, advanced autofocus, and 6K RAW video recording capabilities. It features dual memory card slots, weather sealing, and a built-in vertical grip.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: The Sony PlayStation 5 is a next-generation gaming console that offers 4K graphics, lightning-fast load times, and immersive haptic feedback. It also features a built-in 825GB SSD and support for backward compatibility with many PS4 games.

products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (2021)
products.desc: Powerful laptop with M1 Pro or M1 Max chip
products.description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (2021) is a powerful laptop with a choice of M1 Pro or M1 Max chip, up to 64GB of RAM, and up to 8TB of storage.

products.name: Fitbit Charge 5
products.desc: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS
products.description: The Fitbit Charge 5 is an advanced fitness tracker that features built-in GPS, a heart rate monitor, and up to 7 days of battery life. It also includes advanced sleep tracking, on-wrist temperature monitoring, and a color touchscreen display.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort Earbuds are wireless earbuds with noise-canceling technology and up to 6 hours of battery life.

products.name: Samsung Odyssey G7
products.desc: Curved gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate
products.description: The Samsung Odyssey G7 is a curved gaming monitor with a 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and QLED technology. It features a 1000R curve for an immersive gaming experience and G-Sync compatibility for tear-free gaming.

products.name: GoPro HERO10 Black
products.description: The GoPro HERO10 Black is an action camera with HyperSmooth 4.0 stabilization, up to 5.3K video resolution, and up to 240fps slow-motion video. It also features TimeWarp 3.0, SuperPhoto with improved HDR, and a waterproof design.

products.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
products.desc: Business laptop with 11th Gen Intel processors
products.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a business laptop with 11th Gen Intel processors, up to 16GB of RAM, and up to 2TB of SSD storage.

products.name: Sony A7S III
products.description: The Sony A7S III is a professional-grade mirrorless camera designed for video production. It features a 12.1MP sensor, 4K/120fps video recording, and 16-bit RAW output.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 is an advanced smartwatch with a larger display, improved durability, and faster charging. It includes features like fall detection, heart rate monitoring, and ECG readings.

products.name: DJI Mavic Air 2S
products.description: The DJI Mavic Air 2S is a professional-grade drone with 5.4K video recording, 3-axis gimbal stabilization, and up to 31 minutes of flight time.

products.name: Logitech G Pro X Wireless
products.desc: gaming headset with Blue VO!CE technology
products.description: The Logitech G Pro X Wireless is a wireless gaming headset with Blue VO!CE technology for crystal-clear communication.

products.name: Bowers & Wilkins PX7 Carbon Edition
products.desc: Wireless headphones with carbon fiber finish
products.description: The Bowers & Wilkins PX7 Carbon Edition is a wireless noise-canceling headphones with a carbon fiber finish for a premium look and feel.
